summary: Adds Orc, Elven, and Beast soldiers to the Imperial Legion, plus females of all races.
descriptionHtml:
The Empire is stretched thin in Skyrim and everywhere else. Although they have started recruiting locally it is far from enough, so reinforcements must be called in from the other provinces.

This mod adds a few beast, elf, and orc grunts to the legion, plus females of all races. Nothing more, nothing less!

Compatible with any mod that does not modify the vanilla lvled list LCharSoldierImperial.

This mod has been on Steam since January, but for some reason I have not gotten around to posting it here.

Installation:
use NMM or unpack the .esp file to your skyrimdata folder.

Removal:
Use NMM or delete the file inhumansoldiers.esp.

Future plans:
Diversification. I will add some heavy armor shield using tanks, and some battlemages. No ETA on this at the moment, too much real life interfering. :-(

10. jan 2014: Added compatibility patches for Credo and Becheman121's Rebirth of an Empire. Now the female soldiers will use vanilla female armor instead of modded male. I will remove these patches if the people behind those mods add female versions of their armor.
author: TelvanniFrostmane
